title: In the Ringwraith's Wake (1R214)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If a Nazgul wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player chooses to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.
Lore:	”'He is fading…. We must get him to my father.'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Version: +.
